## The Bitcoin Chronicles - Arc 2.G.3 - Distributed Sovereignty

With settlement no longer bound to a center, communities experiment with distributed sovereignty. This chapter explores how order emerges without a clearing authority and how entangled coordination reshapes legitimacy â€” preparing humanity for the psychological strain of living in a world without delay.
